name: UPostProcessComponent
doc:
PostProcessComponent. Enables Post process controls for blueprints.
   Will use a parent UShapeComponent to provide volume data if available.

Settings: Post process settings to use for this volume.
Priority:
Priority of this volume. In the case of overlapping volumes the one with the highest priority
overrides the lower priority ones. The order is undefined if two or more overlapping volumes have the same priority.
BlendRadius: World space radius around the volume that is used for blending (only if not unbound).
bEnabled: Whether this volume is enabled or not.
bUnbound: set this to false to use the parent shape component as volume bounds. True affects the whole world regardless.
